title: Big Bang Keycloak Helm Chart Values Schema

global.description: Global object to support Keycloak chart as Helm dependency

injection.description: Istio sidecar injection mode (enabled, disabled, or empty for no label)

sidecar.description: Istio Sidecar resource configuration for outbound traffic control

enabled.description: Enable Istio Sidecar resource (restricts outbound traffic)

outboundTrafficPolicyMode.description: Outbound traffic policy mode (REGISTRY_ONLY or ALLOW_ANY)

custom.description: List of custom Istio ServiceEntry resources

authorizationPolicies.description: Istio AuthorizationPolicies configuration for service mesh security

generateFromNetpol.description: Generate Istio AuthorizationPolicies from NetworkPolicy configurations with SPIFFE-based identity verification when service account identities are specified

custom.description: List of custom Istio AuthorizationPolicy resources

denyAll.description: Deny all ingress by default (allow-nothing policy)

additionalPolicies.description: Additional custom Istio AuthorizationPolicies (map structure to avoid override issues)

name.description: Name of the authorization policy (optional, defaults to map key)

labels.description: Additional labels for the authorization policy

selector.description: Pod selector for the authorization policy

action.description: Action to take when rules match

routes.description: Istio VirtualService and gateway configuration for routing traffic to applications

hosts.description: List of host/domain names for this route. Supports templating.

items.description: Hostname or domain. Can use Helm templating (e.g., '{{ .Values.domain }}')

location.description: Location to expose the route (e.g., MESH_EXTERNAL, MESH_INTERNAL)

resolution.description: DNS resolution strategy for the route

metadata.description: Metadata applied to all generated resources

labels.description: Additional labels for all generated resources

annotations.description: Additional annotations for all generated resources

ports.description: List of ports to expose for this route

gateways.description: List of Istio gateways to bind this VirtualService to

hosts.description: List of host/domain names for this route. Supports templating.

items.description: Hostname or domain. Can use Helm templating (e.g., '{{ .Values.domain }}')

service.description: Target Kubernetes service name or FQDN. Supports templating.

port.description: Target service port number. Supports templating for string values.

containerPort.description: Target container/pod port number. Used for NetworkPolicy when different from service port. When omitted, defaults to port value. Supports templating for string values.

passthrough.description: Section used when virtual service is using a passthrough gateway

enabled.description: Configures the virtual service to use tls section with route underneath

gatewayPort.description: Set to https port of passthrough gateway; Defaults to port 8443 if left empty

metadata.description: Metadata applied to all generated resources

labels.description: Additional labels for all generated resources

annotations.description: Additional annotations for all generated resources

selector.description: Pod selector for generating NetworkPolicy and AuthorizationPolicy resources. When provided, automatic ingress policies will be created.

http.description: Advanced HTTP routing rules. When not specified, simple routing to service:port is used.

anyOf.description: Advanced routing with custom http configuration
Simple routing requires service and port when http is not provided

networkPolicies.description: Network policies configuration for the application

prependReleaseName.description: Prepend release name to network policy names

defaultsAsHooks.description: Create hook versions of default policies in addition to regular versions

enabled.description: Enable hook creation for default policies (creates both regular and hook versions)

weight.description: Helm hook weight for execution order

excludeCIDRs.description: CIDRs to exclude from all ipBlock egress policies (except literals)

allowInNamespace.description: Allow egress within the same namespace

allowIstiod.description: Allow Istio control plane communication (TCP port 15012)

definitions.description: Custom egress rule definitions that can be referenced

endPort.description: End port for port range specifications

^[\\w-]+$|^\\*$.description: Pod name or wildcard (*) for all pods

podSelector.description: Pod selector for the source pods
